name: Words Geems FREE
description:
The objective of Words Geems is to make as many 3 - 8 letter words as you can before the 3 minute clock runs out. Using the gems in your words will increase your word score. Pink gems will 2x your score, Blue gems will 3x your score and Purple gems will 5x your score. Pausing the game more than 3 times in one round will reset the game.

Features:
• Great for all Kids
• Never get the same puzzle twice
• Nice graphics
• Awesome puzzle logic game

Words Jewel is very fun for the whole family!
